sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SOURGOUTE, a small town of Asiatic Russia, situ ated on the Obi, in a climate so severe that no grain can be raised in the neighbourhood. The town consists of 168 houses, and contains two churches. It is the residence of a commissary, who collects an annual tribute of furs from the Ostiaks, the inhabitants of the country.
Sourgoute, a river of Tobolsk, in Asiatic Russia, which falls into the Obi near the town of the same name, after a course of 100 miles.
